name: Phantom OS
body:
# Hello and welcome to the Phantom OS project

## What Phantom OS is

* [Phantom Architecture in English](https://github.com/dzavalishin/phantomuserland/wiki/PhantomArchitecture)
* [Big article in Russian - Open Systems Magazine](http://www.osp.ru/os/2011/03/13008200/) - if you don't read russian, you can try to read Google [translated version](https://translate.google.ru/translate?hl=ru&sl=auto&tl=en&u=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.osp.ru%2Fos%2F2011%2F03%2F13008200%2F).

## We look for programmers to join us

Namely, we need someone who will be working with:

* Bytecode interpreter (and we need JIT too)
* Graphics engine, font engine
* Network stack
* Drivers
* ARM port
* MIPS port
* 64 bit verison (either Intel, ARm or MIPS)
* Unit tests
* Framebuffer video drivers
* Java classlib
* Unix compatibility subsystem
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
